intent_atoms.description: CoreData session bookmark diffs must be reconciled with persisted bookmark entities when reconciliation rules are defined.
Execute the random slice benchmark suite on macOS hardware to compare mapped vs. chunked readers under identical workloads once Combine support is available.
Benchmark results should show latency and throughput metrics for mapped and chunked readers on macOS with Combine support.
Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS hardware with XCTest UI support to validate the end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow.
Test must complete successfully without blocking due to missing macOS UI testing entitlements.
Execute Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining throughput parity with CLI harness.
Benchmark should run on macOS with Xcode/Combine and produce comparable latency data.
Session persistence must reconcile CoreData session bookmark diffs with live bookmark entities when reconciliation rules defined.
Track outcome of notarized build Apple Events automation assessment and reference final decision in documentation.

functional_units.name: Connect Bookmark Diffs to Persisted Bookmarks
functional_units.description: Reconciles CoreData session bookmark diffs with persisted bookmark entities

functional_units.name: Random Slice Benchmark Execution
functional_units.description: Runs random slice benchmark suite on macOS hardware to compare mapped vs. chunked readers

functional_units.name: Parse Tree Streaming Selection Automation Tests
functional_units.description: Executes SwiftUI automation flow tests for parse tree streaming selection on macOS

functional_units.name: Combine-backed UI Benchmark Execution
functional_units.description: Captures latency metrics for Combine-backed UI on macOS while maintaining CLI throughput parity

functional_units.name: Session Persistence Reconciliation
functional_units.description: Reconciles CoreData session bookmark diffs with live bookmark entities based on defined rules

functional_units.name: Notarized Build Apple Events Automation Assessment
functional_units.description: Tracks outcome of notarized build automation via Apple Events and updates entitlements
